$Source says Bartell purposely juggled Casey's pop to lure Hudson off of 1B. Hudson did run but spun and ran back. Bartell's throw hit Hudson in the back so Hudson ran to 2B.

$Casey made shoestring catch of liner. French threw one pitch in ninth then play was halted due to rain.  After 30 minutes the game called.
$Galan batted left-handed vs. LHP Shofner because of an injured right elbow.

$Game called for rain
$Start of game delayed by 15 minutes because of rain
$Simmons tossed his bat and argued briefly with home plate umpire Summers about the third strike

ej,simma101,P,stewb901,Arguing balls and strikes $Simmons orginally stayed in the game, playing LF, with West shifting to CF, replacing Outlaw. Stengel also replaced Warstler with Huber at 2B. Simmons 'described his opinion of Stewart's judgment with many gestures for the benefit of the bleacher fans.' Stewart saw this and ejected Simmons who came to home plate to continue his argument. Stengel put Outlaw back in LF (and, oddly, Warstler back at 2B) which brought an argument from Hartnett, who eventually relented and let the Bees revert to their starting lineup (except for the new battery).
ej,vandj101,P,searz901,Balls and strikes Vander Meer ejected by Sears for arguing pitches.

$Russell's drive hit the short protective screen on the LF wall and bounced back into field. Ump Pinelli ruled HR which was ground rule when screen was recently erected.  Dodgers argued and Durocher played under protest.
$Durocher homers off same screen on LF wall.
$Dodgers left 3B unguarded.
$One paper claimed Leiber rounded 3B and stopped then proceeded when Walker bobbled ball but Russell got 2 RBIs.
$Hartnett failed to sacrifice then Gleeson stole 2B.
$250 citizens of Washington, IA in honor of town's centenial celebration.  All had grown beards and dressed in pioneer costumes.  After game they mobbed Judge Landis 4 autographs.

Hartnett rushed out to object.  Gabby finished and started to return to dugout, Gabby reversed his course and started in again including waving his hands in Magerkurth's face.  Hartnett was ejected by Magerkurth but argued for additional 95 seconds.
